[Indulgences in English in favour of the "Hospital of the Holy Ghost", Rome 1520] Hospital of the Holy Ghost (Rome, Italy) Catholic Church. aut
2 sheets ([2] p.)
Richard Pynson, [London : 1520]
Title and imprint from STC. In beginning of text: "consyderynge that our Sauyour Lorde Ihesu criste"--STC. Formerly STC 15479. Identified as STC 15479 on UMI microfilm. Imperfect; fragments only. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
